Elita:

Elita giggled, babbled and nuzzled against her father, she was 
very happy to be with him. Sher little spark missed him so much 


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen 
<roborick007@y...> wrote:
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> Rodimus took his daughter into his arms, before answering 
the question of the Iron Squad Commander.
> 
> Rodimus Prime: Well when Nightlight and I...
> 
> He pauses and he forces himself to talk about this publicly.
> 
> Rodimus Prime: When we were "together" the programming of 
our sparks was merged to form the core spark for Elita here. 
This means that a cop file of the programming from Nightlight's 
spark is within me, and I in her as well. If we were connected 
with a computer running file transfers between us, we could 
upload the old programming to her spark. I believe that this 
would overcome the predacon programming.
> 
> 
> Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:The Iron Squad commander 
looked at his colleague quizzically. He hoped
> Rodimus felt better and acted better.
> 
> Yggdrasil: What do you mean, Rod? Tell us more...
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen 
<roborick007@y...> wrote:
> > : : Rodimus Prime/Kup : : Rodimus comes out of the CR and 
locates
> Kup and Yaggdrasil. He comes in as they are discussing how 
to fix
> Nightlight's programming. Rodimus Prime: I think I know how 
we can fix
> that. It's only theory, but may be our best chance. Kup looks at
> Rodimus, an eyebrowl raised.
> > 
> >
